0.Description:
After quickly moving back after firing straight ahead, you are able to place 2 Bomb Wicks while being in a temporary invincible state.
After movement, you are able to shoot up to 4 Pistol Fires leaving a Light Injury Debuff.
Light Injury will explode when Damaged by Pistol leaving Additional Damage.
Surrounding enemies will be Knocked Back when using Rifle and Pistol Fires.

1.Effect:
[Skill Info: Rifle Fire]
Damage: [101%]
Super Armor Break: [110%]

[Skill Info: Pistol Fire]
Damage per Hit: [101%]
Super Armor Break per Hit: [110%]
Debuff: Light Injury
Debuff Effect: 40% of Additional Damage for
every Pistol Damage per Hit(Max. 5 Stacks)

[Skill Info: Basic]
SG Consumption: [30]
Cooldown: [15sec]
